THIS_TODO_APP_IS: This Todo App is a task management application developed & designed by me to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day tasks by keeping your todos right in your browser tab
HOW_TO: Just type about anything into the task field and click 'Done' or press Enter - your task will instantly fall into your to-do list
Is there any way to organise my tasks?: Is there any way to organise my tasks?
ORGANISING: Certainly! You can move tasks by dragging & dropping them up or down. You can also mark your tasks as completed by clicking the check mark icon and delete them by clicking the trash can icon. Additionally, you can hide all your tasks by clicking on the arrow below the input field
Can I clear all my tasks quickly?: Can I clear all my tasks quickly?
CLEAR_QUICKLY: Yes! Once you add any task to the list and mark any of them as completed, two buttons will appear at the top of the page - they will allow you to reset all your tasks or clear completed ones
OTHER_OPTIONS?: Are there any other options in the application?
OPTIONS: Among other things, you can mark a task as more important by clicking on its icon on the left - it will appear in a different color
SAVING: Yes, all your tasks are being automatically saved in your browser local storage, so you can feel free leaving or refreshing it. In future releases, I'll also add .JSON "import-export" functionality to keep your todos safe
RESET_ALL?: Are you sure that you want to delete all of your todos?
RESET_COMPLETED?: Are you sure that you want to delete all of your completed todos?
TODOS_DELETED: Your todos have been successfully deleted
